name: Blocky Police Super Heroes
description:
Play as a fearless and brave blocky police cop chasing dangerous criminal on police cars in blocky city. With plenty of blocky cars at your disposal to aid you in the missions of criminal hunt, be part of the courageous police squad and be the super hero who would leave no stone unturned to win this police battle against crime. This is a dangerous police battle being fought on police cars with all the growing crime but you are not the one to back out! You have a variety of missions to play and master, some are timed while others let you roam around the beautiful blocky city without the clock-pressure; however the focus always remains on catching the criminals who are running away from the grasp of law. The crime rate is on a rise in the city and as a cop, you stand in the way of all these dangerous criminal plans. So don’t let the mafia take control and destroy the peace of the city.

Blocky Police Cars Crime City offers beautiful 3D environment with super realistic physics. It has plenty of challenging city crime fighting missions where you have to battle it out with the bad guys on high speed cars. It is definitely one of those police games that gives you the adrenaline rush of playing any other criminal hunt super hero game. You play as the blocky police cop whose name will become the symbol of terror for all dangerous criminal groups operating in your beloved blocky city. Time to rev up the engines of all those police cars, hit the road and make your presence felt to all those criminal bosses who think that a blocky cop cannot stop their heinous criminal activities and restore the peace of this beautiful blocky city.

Be the guardian cop of the city and let the rule of law reign by completing all the missions and winning this battle against crime!
